body:
So I just came on to Minecraft and joined a server, I had loads of fun and then I went on Avicus, This showed up..... "Internal Exception: java.lang.ClassCastException: biz cannot be cast to fv" This was only on this server and I was wondering why.

Can Anyone Help me?
